entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot reuse Unix Domain Socket on Windows #71291
  • Mark `Assembly.GetCallingAssembly` with `[RequiresDynamicCode]`. #71290
  • Member-level trimming breaks ASP.NET tracing instrumentation #71289
  • Use modern-themed buttons in the host error message box. #71288
  • .NET 8: Make call-to-action host errors source-build friendly #71287
  • .NET 8: Improve host version selection semantics #71286
  • .NET 8: Simplify RID Model #71285
  • .NET 8: Host improvements #71284
  • .NET 8: Localize apphost error page #71283
  • .NET 8: Enable shared libraries and runtimes for a software suite #71282
  • Hashset Remove is not throwing on enumeration #71281

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Expose `DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler.Text` property #69168
  • Could not load ICU data. UErrorCode: 2 Abortado #71277
  • Corrupted output writing large array to an AnonymousPipeServerStream on linux using netcoreapp3.1 #70798
  • Comments on 'System.Convert' are obsolete #70131
    7.0.0
  • BigInteger multiplication result has incorrect sign #69970

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve allocations in NegotiateStreamPal #71280
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • More use of SequenceEqual, IndexOf, IndexOfAnyExcept, etc. #71278
    area-Meta

Merged

  • Allow `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` on the LHS of block copies #70782
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid temporary byte[] per arg in Process.Start on Unix #71279
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Provide the invalid value in the number parsing FormatException message #67415
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fixed obsolete comment details on System.Convert #70257
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add stateless shape support for caller-allocated buffer and guaranteed unmarshal #71244
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Custom marshallers v2 usage #71238
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Fix incorrect BigInteger multiply result for -a * a #69982
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

Updated

  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Re-enable automatic gc safe transitions in threaded wasm mode #71229
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, area-Threading-mono
  • JIT: strengthen checking of the loop table #71184
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix double reporting of some GC frame slots #71245
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete dead code from and fix `getSIMDStructFromField` #71226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Add a minimal version of gsharedvt for llvmonly, enabled… #70867
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Implement ICorProfilerInfo13 to support object handle creation/destruction/access #71257
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Redo minor cleanups in System.Runtime.Numerics #71274
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add `System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Heif` and `Webp`. #71227
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement Tar async APIs #70574
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink loop with stackalloc #69335
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add CET pipeline #71223
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Refactor segment size computation #71178
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update DependencyGraphViewer to allow for DGML reading #70690
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use CLOCK_BOOTTIME to calculate BootTime on linux #67589
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
